1. What is the current stand of Govt on Dawood Ibrahim?

2. What Govt think about Ram Mandir?

3. When Govt end cast based reservation?

4. When Govt imposed Uniform Civil code?

#PMModiSpeaksToTimesNow

I live in Mumbai! I don't know too much about her!
Second thing is we ask questions to them whom we trust! We expect something from them who can fulfill our demand! 
And Mamta!
Worse than wrost!
Expect from Rajdeep but I trust Arnab!

In a democracy we are free to ask whatever we want!
But seriously till now I have full faith on @narendramodi ji!
And I believe only he can short out every problem & make India better!
You are bit of right! But I never ask them! But Bengal become worse under bano! Too much Political violence in their!
